title: Gateway National Recreation Area: Contact Public Affairs
body: Contact Public Affairs         Interior Secretary Ken Salazar visited Floyd Bennett Field campgrounds in June 2011. NPS PHOTO  Public Affairs Office Gateway National Recreation Area includes three units: Jamaica Bay (NY), Sandy Hook (NJ) and Staten Island (NY). The Public Affairs Office serves all three units. Address: 210 New York Avenue Staten Island, New York 10305 Phone: 718-354-4602 e-mail us
